briefTitle: Efficacy Study of Shortwave Diathermy for the Treatment of Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
officialTitle: The Effectiveness of Shortwave Diathermy in Knee Osteoarthritis: A Randomized Controlled Trial
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether shortwave diathermy is effective in reducing knee pain and increasing function of the patients with knee osteoarthritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Change in Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis (WOMAC) Index
